species.name: dewgong
descriptions: Dewgong loves to snooze on bitterly cold ice. The sight of this Pok√©mon sleeping on a glacier was mistakenly thought to be a mermaid by a mariner long ago.
In snow, the pure white coat covering its body obscures it from predators.
It loves frigid seas with ice floes. It uses its long tail to change swimming direction quickly.
Its body is covered with a pure white fur. The colder the weather, the more active it becomes.
Its entire body is a snowy-white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.

abilities.name: thick-fat
abilities.effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

abilities.name: hydration
abilities.effect: Cures any major status ailment after each turn during rain.

abilities.name: ice-body
abilities.effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during hail.  Protects against hail damage.
